message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 10,000 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v22.8.8, in the latest version, we have implemented great functions such as ChatGPT & OneDrive support for Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, during 2023.4.24 ~ 2023.5.6, for Workers' Day, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at US$24(tax not included), is discounted to US$14.99(tax not included).
message.zh:
在 2023.4.24 ~ 2023.5.6 五一劳动节期间，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
